course_description: This applied experiential course, grounded in evidence-based logic, enables you to develop a strategic marketing plan for a real client. Your learning is built upon the knowledge you've gained from courses as well as upon consulting principles, market research and analysis that will lead to actionable recommendations for your client. The goals of this course are to help you learn how to use the consulting process to define your client's challenge, to develop a research plan based on your hypotheses, and to conduct research that supports your recommendations.
